name: MEC Drencher Helmet Cover - Unisex
description:
OK, it's as fashionable as a shower cap, but the function is indisputable. You will arrive with dry hair and a warm brainpan.Made of polyurethane-coated two-layer nylon, with taped seams for waterproofness.Elastic drawcord with toggle for fast, easy fitting.Webbing ladder at back for attaching a light.Reflective treatment.

        Sustainability
